alert.note: Alert for Charles; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 5:23PM EDT until April 06 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central St. Marys County in southern Maryland... South central Charles County in southern Maryland... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 523 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Colonial Beach, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Leonardtown, Saint Clements Bay, Wicomico River, White Point Beach, Cobb Island, Rock Point, Bushwood, Clements, Issue, Compton, Morganza, Tompkinsville, Abell, Chaptico, Swan Point, Tintop Hill, Redgate, Maddox, Avenue and Oakville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
